mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT LEC_RE_NUM, LEC_RE_WRITER, CONTENT, LEC_RE_STU_REF_GROUP, STAR, DELETE_YN, LECTURE_REVIEW.USER_REGDATE FROM LECTURE_REVIEW INNER JOIN users ON LECTURE_REVIEW.lec_re_writer=users.LEC_USER_ID WHERE LEC_RE_STU_REF_GROUP=#{lecReStuRefGroup} AND DELETE_YN='N' ORDER BY LEC_RE_NUM ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_REVIEW (LEC_RE_NUM, LEC_RE_WRITER, CONTENT, LEC_RE_STU_REF_GROUP, STAR,USER_REGDATE) VALUES(#{lecReNum},#{lecReWriter},#{content},#{lecReStuRefGroup},#{star},SYSDATE)
